title: Viewability
description: Description of viewability measured properties of an advertisement

xdm:adUnitDepth.title: Ad Unit Depth
xdm:adUnitDepth.description: Oftentimes, publishers embed ad units inside containers/iFrames in order retain control of the ad and any potential interaction with the surfer/web page. This describes how many 'containers' the ad unit is displayed inside of.

xdm:viewportHeight.title: Viewport Height
xdm:viewportHeight.description: The number of vertical pixels of the window the ad is displayed in, measured at runtime.

xdm:viewportWidth.title: Viewport Width
xdm:viewportWidth.description: The number of horizontal pixels of the window the ad is displayed in, measured at runtime.

xdm:adHeight.title: Ad Height
xdm:adHeight.description: The number of vertical pixels of the player, measured at runtime. This can be larger than the size of the ad if the player has extra controls or thumbnails.

xdm:adWidth.title: Ad Width
xdm:adWidth.description: The number of horizontal pixels of the player, measured at runtime. This can be larger than the size of the ad if the player has extra controls or thumbnails.

xdm:playerVolume.title: Player Volume Percentage
xdm:playerVolume.description: The player volume percentage, measured at runtime where 0 is muted and 100 is maximum volume.

xdm:measurementEligible.title: Viewability Measurement Eligible
xdm:measurementEligible.description: Whether or not the ad was eligible to viewability measurement. An ad is eligible if the unit has a supported creative format and tag type.

xdm:implementationDetails.title: Viewabiltity implementation details
xdm:implementationDetails.description: The name and version of the library instrumented to measure viewability metrics.

xdm:viewable.title: Viewable Ad
xdm:viewable.description: Display ads are considered viewable when at least 50% of the ad is visible for at least 1 second. Video ads are considered viewable when at least 50% of the ad is visible while the video is playing for at least 2 consecutive seconds. All viewable ads are measurable, because you can't confirm that an ad has met the criteria for viewability unless it can be measured.

xdm:activeWindow.title: Active Window
xdm:activeWindow.description: Indicates whether ad was shown on active window on users' device.

xdm:percentViewable.title: Percent Viewable
xdm:percentViewable.description: Percent of pixels in the ad deemed viewable at measurement time.
